termsOfService.title: Terms of Service for Notion Data Access

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.body: By connecting your Notion account and granting our application (“Service”) access to your Notion page content, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, do not authorize our Service.

sections.title: 2. Description of the Service
sections.body: Our Service allows authorized users to retrieve their Notion page content to generate flashcards or other study materials. The retrieval and processing of this content is solely for your personal, non-commercial use (unless otherwise agreed in writing).

sections.title: 3. Authorization and Access
sections.body: By authorizing our Service via Notion’s OAuth process, you grant our Service the ability to read and process the content of your specified Notion pages. You may revoke access at any time by following the instructions provided by Notion or within the Service’s settings.

sections.title: 4. User Responsibilities
sections.body: You are responsible for ensuring that any content you authorize us to access does not violate applicable laws or infringe upon any third-party rights. You represent that you have the necessary rights and permissions to grant us access to the Notion page content.

sections.title: 5. Intellectual Property
sections.body: All Notion page content remains your property or the property of its respective owners. Our Service does not claim ownership over the content you provide or authorize us to access. The flashcards or study materials generated are derived from your content and remain subject to your rights and any applicable third-party rights.

sections.title: 6. Prohibited Uses
sections.body: You agree not to use the Service to upload, store, generate, or share any illegal, defamatory, harassing, infringing, or otherwise objectionable content. You may not use the Service to violate any applicable laws or regulations.

sections.title: 7. Privacy and Data Use
sections.body: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy for details on how we handle and protect your data.

sections.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.body: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranty of any kind. We do not warrant that the Service will meet your requirements, be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that any information obtained will be accurate or reliable.

sections.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
sections.body: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting from your use of, or inability to use, the Service or your reliance on any content accessed via the Service.

sections.title: 10. Indemnification
sections.body: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses arising out of or related to your use of the Service, including any content accessed from Notion.

sections.title: 11. Termination
sections.body: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the Service at any time, with or without notice, if we believe you have violated these terms or engaged in any misconduct.

sections.title: 12. Changes to Terms
sections.body: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Your continued use of the Service after any modifications indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.

sections.title: 13. Governing Law
sections.body: These Terms of Service will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of your jurisdiction, without regard to conflict of law principles.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy for Notion Data Access

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.body: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and disclose the personal information and Notion data you provide through our Service.

sections.title: 2. Data We Collect
sections.body:
Account Information: We may collect and store basic account information such as your name, email address, and user ID as provided by your registration with our application.
Notion Access Token: When you authorize the Service, we receive an access token from Notion that allows us to retrieve page content from your Notion workspace.
Notion Page Content: We access and process the text and other content from the Notion pages you choose to connect to our Service.

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
sections.body:
To Provide the Service: We use your Notion page content to generate flashcards or study materials as requested by you.
To Maintain and Improve the Service: We may use aggregated and anonymized data for internal analytics and to improve the Service’s performance and features.

sections.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
sections.body: We take reasonable measures to protect your data, including using secure servers and encryption where appropriate. However, no method of data storage or transmission can be guaranteed 100% secure.

sections.title: 5. Data Sharing and Disclosure
sections.body:
Third Parties: We do not sell or rent your personal information or Notion page content to third parties. We only share data with service providers or contractors as necessary to operate and improve our Service, and they are bound by confidentiality agreements.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law or if we believe in good faith that such disclosure is necessary to comply with legal obligations or protect the rights, property, or safety of our users or others.

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
sections.body: We retain your Notion access token and processed content for as long as you maintain an account with our Service or as needed to provide the requested functionality. Upon revocation or termination of your account, we will delete or anonymize your data according to our standard data deletion practices.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights and Choices
sections.body:
Access and Control: You may revoke the Service’s access to your Notion account at any time. You may also request that we delete your personal data.
Updates to Your Information: You can update your account information by contacting support or through your account settings.

sections.title: 8. International Transfers
sections.body: If you access the Service from outside [your jurisdiction], your data may be transferred and stored on servers located in other countries. We take steps to ensure adequate protection for your information in accordance with applicable laws.

sections.title: 9. Children’s Privacy
sections.body: The Service is not intended for individuals under the age of 13 (or the age defined by local law). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us so we can remove it.

sections.title: 10. Changes to this Privacy Policy
sections.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Your continued use of the Service after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: 11. Contact Us
sections.body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data rights, please contact us at [Insert Contact Email or Address].
